caption.p: Effect of “White Marsh” grapefruit ( C. paradisi) fresh peel essential oil on egg albumin-induced rat paw oedema. Results are expressed as Mean ± SEM. VEH, ECH and ASA represent vehicle (5% Tween 80), Marsh peel essential oil (FMPG) and diclofenac, respectively. ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001, statistically different from negative control group (ANOVA, Dunnett’s).
